messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Well, the CMO isnt here so i gonna say that shit: SET YOUR SUIT SENSORS TO MAX!!!

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
CentCom Research Initiatives

Cargo: Your station has been chosen for an epidemiological research project. Send us your cargo shuttle to receive your research samples.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Incinerator.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Power Systems Nominal

Power has been restored to LizardStation 13. We apologize for the inconvenience.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Localized hyper-energetic flux wave detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Fore Primary Hallway.

messages.author: Deeja-Shaleez (Assistant)
messages.body: <font face="Verdana">THE KING OF CARGONIA IS HAVING A GOOD TIME AMIRITE FAM!?!?</font>

messages.author: Deeja-Shaleez (Assistant)
messages.body: <font face="Verdana">THIS IS ME YOU GREAT DEALER!! I WILL GET THE GOOD STUFF AND FOR THE RIGHT PRICE I WILL GET IT FOR YOU!!!!!!!!!!!!</font>

messages.author: Deeja-Shaleez (Assistant)
messages.body: <font face="Verdana">UHOH IT'S THE CLOWN!! SEND HELP!!</font>
